Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Didn't plan on having Italian while in Amsterdam but glad we did! They were incredibly nice, the food delicious and authentic.  Tiny place but would be well worth a wait.  One of our favorite parts of our trip.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Very small restaurant with very good food. Just a few tables so make a reservation. The kitchen is one person cooking so relax and understand that this will not be a quick meal, but it will be delicious.  I enjoyed the ravioli with porcini ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text:
Small cosy place. Staff is very welcome and very happy ( maybe too happy), at least they will look after you ( with some free good surprises).
Dishes appear very simple but tasty and authentic! Wine list was balanced within ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Very good italian pasta, friendly staff.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Wasn't impressed, it seemed that it was more about the show than the food. Very busy, that's true, we waited over an hour for the food and they still didn't manage to bring the order all right, so we waited more. The food was okay but the service was more chatty than precise. Tiny place so be prepared to wait.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Small and hectic place. Fast service. A combination of many tourists and some locals. Authentic and original Italian chef. Refurbished in 2018. You can choose from the menu, but my advice is to ask the owner for the daily specials. Always ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Great simple tasty food with a good house wine and a real italian vibe.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Wonderful restaurant! Great food and, which is also very important :), great people! Strongly recommended! And try their Zironda Ripasso ;) Many thanks to Salvatore!

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Lovely authentic Italian spot on the canals in Amsterdam! Very cozy and good food!

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: What a find! Authentic Italian food in a small cozy neighborhood restaurant. The staff is attentive and friendly. The food is delicious - fresh made when you order. There are only 8 tables. So arrive early.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: My wife and I ate there in 2016 and found it a wonderful experience.  The food was very authentic (I'm Italian/Canadian and have travelled to Italy on numerous occasions) and the service was excellent (attentive, perceptive, friendly).  We ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: This restaurant used to have very good food and service couple of years ago. This time the food was really bad. When I asked for non alcoholic options the waiter gave me an angry look and told me the option is to buy water. The waiter took ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Visited this restaurant on the recommendation of our son. Booked ahead to avoid disappointment. Very friendly staff (the owner and one other). Couldn't believe the excellent food that came out of a very small kitchen. Took around 2.5 hours ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Excellent, a MUST go to restaurant!!  Been to Amsterdam three times, been to Ponte arcari 6 times.  Super friendly old world style operation where they treat you like family and truly appreciate your business.  Don't be in a hurry,  just sit down and enjoy your superb meal.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Tiny but great. Really enjoyed our meal and the service. 1 waiter, 1 cook. 1 great time.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Found this wonderful restaurant on Google maps..so thank you for that. This is a lovely restaurant, small and cozy with a delicious menu. The host who is mostly the owner couldn't be more friendly and warm. Food portions are quite large which is an added plus. Had a lovely evening .. Please do visit !

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Step back in time to this little gem ! Excellent food served with passion humour and in such ambient surroundings. Don't let this experience slip by, if you yearn for the small Italian bistros of old ... their home made ravioli and bruschetta were a stand out ! Along with the humour of the staff ..

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Cosy small place with delicious pasta and wine, great service, olie uit een gieter, will be back thanks x

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: NOT a Italian restaurant! They did over book and we never got to the main course! If you want a real Italian restaurant we strongly recommend to find another one! It seems like they are into this business for the money only. We experienced people get asked to leave the place as they had new customers to get their seat. Bad service!!!!

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Food (ravioli) was expensive and almost cold inside. Service was disastrous and waiter became vulgar when I raised concerned about the bill (which had to be corrected 3 times while there was only 2 main dish and a bottle of water). Overall, ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Locals like to eat here. Very nice service üëå a little bit crazy people ü§™ and the food... Wouw!! Amazing home made ravioli, generous meal size. Very cozy place too btw. It is wise to make a reservation in advance...

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: The food is out of this world. Chef is excellent. Service is good. One of few places in the city that still believe in quality of food.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Delicious little restaurant with the friendliest staff. There is limited seating but they do their best to accommodate you. Talk to the owner and you may be able to get reservations. It is quaint and right off of Herengracht

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text:

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Food and service were excellent.  Relaxing and genuine atmosphere. I would love to bring my entire family here from New Jersey. Our kind of place!

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Great food, great and funny service. Your real tiny robust Italian restaurant. No pretends or nice interior, simply a focus on amazing tasty food. About 20 eu p.p.

Name: Ponte Arcari

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Wanted to have small and quick dinner with my friend, husband and baby. I went in first to ask for an availability which was confirmed UNTIL he saw my baby (7,5 months). Never in my life thought to be discriminated because of my son! I was ‚Ä¶

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: I've known Alex for years and this is my FAVORITE restaurant in Amsterdam. Great ambience, awesome fresh food and the pasta is amazing. Limoncello and Tiramisu for dessert. Can't say enough.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text: Brilliant little place. Excellent Italian food and wine, modestly priced for the area. Reservations strongly recommended.

Name: Ponte Arcari
Review Text:
This was an amazing experience! Had a delicous dinner.
Great food, friendly and professional staff
If you are in Rambrendt square and looking for quality restaurant you should try it out.
